backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister implementing user profiles, onboarding, tasks, reminders, wellness logs, mood entries, and the new feedback request API with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying old state into the new schema and initializing an empty feedbackRequests map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting files, components, and tests involved in the new feedback request feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including routing, assistant logic, UI components, and the new feedback page link.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router with auth gating, onboarding flow, layout, and registration of the new /settings/feedback route.
frontend/src/assistant/assistantBrain.ts: Deterministic assistant logic routing user inputs to intent-specific template responses with safety checks.
frontend/src/assistant/emotionalSupportT: Provides generators for affirmations, venting responses, mood check-ins, and mood-based replies with emotional support disclaimers.
frontend/src/assistant/intents.ts: Defines intent types and detects user intent from input text using keyword matching.
frontend/src/assistant/planningTemplates: Generates daily plans and end‑of‑day summaries based on tasks and user preferences.
Checks for high‑risk input and adds wellness or emotional support disclaimers to responses.
frontend/src/assistant/studyTemplates.ts: Creates study explanations, exam prep plans, and converts content into short notes.
frontend/src/assistant/styleGuide.ts: Provides helpers for formatting responses, creating lists, and adding encouragement messages.
frontend/src/assistant/workTemplates.ts: Generates task prioritization advice, email drafts, focus tips, and meeting summaries.
frontend/src/components/animation/MicroM: Implements FadeIn and SlideIn components with motion‑reduction support for UI animations.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for auth state and errors.
frontend/src/components/chat/QuickAction: Displays a row of quick‑action buttons that trigger preset prompts in the chat interface.
Layout component with header, mobile and desktop navigation, and content area offset handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header showing app branding, user greeting, and login button based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/wellness/Breathi: Guided 4-7-8 breathing exercise component with timed phases, cycles, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider and hook managing auth client creation, identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, tasks, reminders, and wellness data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounting the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Chat/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat UI, handling message input, auto-scrolling, and generating assistant replies using stored user data and tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Feedback/FeedbackPage: Allows users to submit feedback with validation and displays past feedback requests sorted by recency.
frontend/src/pages/History/HistoryPage.t: Shows recent mood, wellness, and task history with basic stats and trend displays for the past week.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding/Onboarding: Guides users through a two-step onboarding flow to collect role, preferences, and goals before submitting them.
frontend/src/pages/Settings/SafetyPrivac: Displays safety warnings, emergency guidance, and an accordion explaining what the AI can and cannot do.
frontend/src/pages/Settings/SettingsPage: Renders a settings form allowing users to update role, name, and personal schedule/preferences, and saves changes via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/Today/TodayPage.tsx: Displays today's task list with add/complete functionality and optionally shows a generated daily plan and summary.
frontend/src/pages/Wellness/WellnessPage: Provides logging for hydration, sleep, and mood, plus access to wellness entries and breathing exercises.
frontend/src/state/chatStore.ts: Zustand store managing chat messages with helpers to add and clear messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, versions, and existing feature definitions.
